QNodeEditor.graphics.cutter module¶

Extension of QGraphicsItem for graphics of an edge cutting line

Bases: QGraphicsItem

Get the socket the drag should connect to (or None if not connected to any socket) :param mouse_pos: mouse position (global coordinates) :return: Socket or None: dragged socket (or None if hovering freely)

Module contents¶

Module containing graphics for all node editor elements
